Body:
"""Test create_storagegroup_snap."""
with mock.patch.object(self.replication, 'create_resource') as mock_create:
    self.replication.create_storagegroup_snap(self.data.storagegroup_name,
        'snap_name')
    self.replication.create_storagegroup_snap(self.data.storagegroup_name,
        'snap_name', ttl=2, hours=True)
    self.assertEqual(2, mock_create.call_count)
